definition: phosgene COCl2, a poisonous gas/carbonyl chloride
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The Carbonic dichloride and the Trichloromethyl carbonate are two commonly used acylating reagent to product the Iminodibenzyl carbonyl chloride.
sentences.chinese: 目前常採用光氣和三光氣作爲酰化劑合成該產物。

sentences.english: The Carbonic dichloride and the Trichloromethyl carbonate are two commonly used acylating reagent to product the Iminodibenzyl carbonyl chloride.
sentences.chinese: 目前常採用光氣和三光氣作爲酰化劑合成該產物。

sentences.english: The key equipment in polycondensation phase of non-phosgene process was emphatically introduced.
sentences.chinese: 同時，介紹了非光氣法縮聚階段的關鍵設備。

sentences.english: The reaction kinetics of synthesizing aryl isocyanate by aryl amine and phosgene was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了芳胺和光氣反應生成異氰酸酯的反應動力學。

sentences.english: The p-chlorophenyl isocyanate is synthesised by carbonyl chloride and p-chloroaniline.
sentences.chinese: 採用光氣與對氯苯胺合成對氯苯基異氰酸酯。

sentences.english: Objective To study clinical manifestation and remedy of acute phosgene poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性光氣中毒的臨牀表現與救治。

sentences.english: Research and Application of Triphosgene Instead of Phosgene for Synthesizing Compounds;
sentences.chinese: 由光氣與乙硫醇合成氯甲酸乙硫醇酯。

sentences.english: Objective To search for a phosgene free method for preparing organic isocyanates with a high yield.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討異氰酸酯的無光氣製備方法。

sentences.english: The chemical properties of the solid phosgene make it have very widespread use.
sentences.chinese: 由於固體光氣的化學性質，使其有着極廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical features of acute phosgene poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索急性光氣中毒的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the characteristics and treatment of group acute phosgene intoxication.
sentences.chinese: 目的旨在探討羣體性急性光氣中毒的特點與救治。
